member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Sign in to Dynamics 365.
Go to Settings > Unified Service Desk > Options.
Click New on the command bar to create a new option.
For the new option, type ClientCacheVersionNumber in the Name box, and an alphanumeric number in the Value box. The alphanumeric value is used as the cache key for Unified Service Desk.The alphanumeric value can be of any value but unique for each time you change.
Click Save..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.BestPracticesAnalyser.Properties.Resources.BPA_REPORT_ProcessTerminationThreshold_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ProcessTerminationThreshold Indicates the timeout period for the duration (in milliseconds) that the Unified Service Desk monitoring process (usdmp.exe) waits before terminating an unresponsive Internet Explorer process, which also causes Unified Service Desk to become unresponsive. Unified Service Desk works best when ProcessTerminationThreshold option is set between the range 0 and 30000..

member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Sign in to Dynamics 365.

Click Save..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to TabShutdownDelay is a key which causes Internet Explorer processes to terminate on demand. Setting the value other than zero means the TabShutdownDelay is enabled.\nUnified Service Desk works best when TabShutdownDelay is disabled (value is set to zero)..

member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Open C:/ > Windows > regedit.

Choose Decimal in the Base group box.
Click OK..
